long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of getting notifications for Facebook games you don't want to play? This extension will hide all Facebook messages relating to the messenger game "Big Fish" when active!



Update 1.1 - fixed manifest error
Update 1.2 - added compatibility with facebook.com/messages and messenger.com
Update 1.3 - fixed manifest error
Update 1.4 - fixed bug with facebook homepage messages not being recognized as a source
Update 1.4.1 - Streamlined code to make it play nicer with the facebook homepage
